Data processing outputs module

utils.output_files.pkl_histograms(histograms, output_file='outputs/histograms/histogram.pkl')[source]

Save a histograms dictionary to a specified pickle file.

Parameters:

  • histogram (Dict[str, Dict[str, Hist]]) – Mapping of region and observable to histograms.

  • output_dir (str) – pickle file to save the histogram in.

utils.output_files.save_histograms(hist_dict, output_file='outputs/histograms/histograms.root', add_offset=False)[source]

Save histograms to a specified directory.

Parameters:

  • hist_dict (dict) – Dictionary of histograms to save.

  • output_dir (str) – Directory to save the histograms.

utils.output_files.unpkl_histograms(pickled_file='outputs/histograms/histogram.pkl')[source]

Save read a histograms dictionary from a specified pickle file.

Parameters:

pickled_file (str) – pickle file to read the histogram from.

Returns:

histograms – Mapping of region and observable to histograms

Return type:

Dict[str, Dict[str, , Hist]]
